title: Are they calling people to shift to AIML

comments.body:
Ok so I didn't participate in the pessat 2nd rnd and apparently ppl who participated in the 2nd round are the only ones who got calls.

I called the admission dept. and asked them if calls went to ppl and what is the current situation like are there any seats left and the person on the call was kinda rude and said no to every single question.

It felt like he didn't want to give any info at all. 

If you get a call or any information regarding aiml seats then pls dm me as well.

If anyone has any info pls dm or post here. Thx.

Yeah they're irritating people. Hit back at them and be firm, get your parents involved, they'll talk
Source: been there done that
